name: Leap of Faith (DEMBERG)
description:
Do you remember that guy from that video game, who jumps from buildings, but he's not sure if he will land safely? Well, the guy in this game will not land safely .. Enjoy!

Instructions

Move to the right and to the left in order to avoid the obstacles! It sounds easy, but you know what they say... "Roses are red, Violets are blue... we have airplanes, they'll f#$% you, too". (hehehe)

Credits
  • Concept: Demberg Studios
  • Programmer: George Pagkalis
  • Art/Animation/UI: Rea Papadopetrou
  • Sound Design/Music/Additional UI: Denia Palaiologou
